item.title: 美联储主席戴利表示对 9 月降息持开放态度
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）表示，政策制定者将很快准备好降低利率，并补充说关税引发的通胀很可能是暂时的。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly suggested policymakers will be ready to lower interest rates soon, adding that inflation stemming from tariffs will likely prove temporary.】

item.title: 巴西面临关税，牛肉供应商为乌拉圭工厂发生冲突
item.description: Marfrig Global Foods SA 和 Minerva SA 正在就反垄断审查中心的乌拉圭牛肉加工厂发生冲突；而此时，美国的关税正使这些资产对巴西肉类加工企业更有价值。【原文：Marfrig Global Foods SA and Minerva SA are clashing over Uruguay beef plants at the center of an antitrust review — at a time when US tariffs are making those assets more valuable to the Brazilian meatpackers.】

item.title: 特朗普停建风力发电厂威胁就业和蓝领工人的支持
item.description: 在劳动节即将到来之际，白宫正在吹捧唐纳德-特朗普总统对美国工人的承诺，内政部刚刚赞扬了 "为美国近海能源产业加油助力 "的男男女女。【原文：The White House is touting President Donald Trump’s commitment to US workers in the run-up to Labor Day, and the Interior Department just praised the men and women “fueling America’s offshore energy industry.”】

item.title: 陷入困境的大麻运营商施瓦泽接近债务重组
item.description: 在大麻行业等待可能提高利润的关键监管变化的同时，Schwazze 正在接近与债权人的重组，这将削减药房运营商的债务负担，并为其注入新的资金。【原文：While the marijuana industry awaits potential key regulatory changes that could boost profits, Schwazze is closing in on a restructuring with creditors that will slash the dispensary operator’s debt load and inject it with new money.】

item.title: Vanguard 与美国证券交易委员会就顾问利益冲突达成和解
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会称，Vanguard Advisers Inc. 鼓励顾问为客户注册个人金融服务，而不适当披露员工的经济利益。【原文：Vanguard Advisers Inc. encouraged advisers to enroll customers in personal financial services without properly disclosing employees’ financial interest to do so, the US Securities and Exchange Commission said.】

item.title: Klarna 首次公开募股将于九月拉开序幕
item.description: 以 Klarna Group Plc 为首，8 月份出现了一波首次公开募股（IPO）申请热潮，为有可能最快于下周开始上市的六家公司创造了条件，激起了人们对未来几个月的殷切期望。【原文：A wave of IPO filings in August led by Klarna Group Plc has set the stage for a half-dozen companies to potentially begin marketing their listings as soon as next week, stoking high expectations for the coming months.】

item.title: 科乐美希望重振 "金属齿轮 "游戏系列
item.description:
Metal Gear Solid Delta：《金属齿轮固体：三角洲：噬蛇者》是 2004 年作品的重制版，本周上市，获得好评

。【原文：

Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater, a remake of a 2004 entry, came out this week to positive reviews

】

item.title: 自 2020 年以来，ESG 债券在公司债券中所占比例最小
item.description: 带有传统的环境、社会或治理标签的债券在已售出的公司债券中所占比例是多年来最低的，这是 2025 年市场放缓的另一个信号。【原文：Bonds carrying a traditional environmental, social or governance label account for the lowest share of corporate debt sold in years, in another signal of the market’s slowdown in 2025.】

item.title: 卢拉说，巴西政府将公布 2026 年预算计划
item.description: 圣保罗页报》（Folha de S.Paulo）称，路易斯-伊纳西奥-卢拉-达席尔瓦（Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva）总统的政府将公布其 2026 年年度预算法案，其中不包括法院强制支付的 130 亿雷亚尔（约合 24 亿美元）的额外空间。【原文：President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva’s government is set to unveil its annual budget bill for 2026 without the extra space of 13 billion reais ($2.4 billion) from court-ordered payments known as precatorios, says Folha de S.Paulo.】

item.title: 卡尼任命前运输山公司首席执行官领导重大项目办公室
item.description: 道恩-法雷尔（Dawn Farrell）曾负责跨山输油管道的扩建工作，现被加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）任命为加拿大政府快速推进大型新基础设施项目的负责人。【原文：Dawn Farrell, who oversaw the expansion of the Trans Mountain oil pipeline, has been named by Prime Minister Mark Carney to lead the government’s effort to fast-track large new infrastructure projects in Canada.】

item.title: 如果欧洲的数字主权受到攻击，马克龙誓言报复
item.description: 法国总统埃马纽埃尔-马克龙誓言，如果任何国家采取有损欧洲数字主权的措施，他将作出强烈反应。【原文：French President Emmanuel Macron vowed a strong response if any country takes measures that undermine Europe’s digital sovereignty.】

item.title: 比索走强，阿根廷再次收紧银行外汇规则
item.description: 阿根廷总统哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）的政府在中期选举前加大了支持比索和缓解通货膨胀的力度，因此阿根廷再次增加了对商业贷款机构的外币限制。【原文：Argentina increased foreign-currency restrictions at commercial lenders yet again, as President Javier Milei’s government ramps up efforts to support the peso and ease inflation ahead of midterm elections.】

item.title: 这是一个在理论和实践上都充满挑战的时代
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 美国农民缩减开支，农村经济面临威胁
item.description: 本周，阳光明媚，气温适宜，迎来了本年度美国最大的农业展。由于农作物价格低迷和贸易关税挤压农业部门，与会者的情绪反差极大。【原文：Sunny skies and mild temperatures this week greeted the biggest US farm show of the year. The contrast couldn’t be greater with the sentiment among attendees as low crop prices and trade tariffs squeeze the agricultural sector.】

item.title: 美国消费者信心指数因经济前景黯淡而下降
item.description: 由于与关税相关的对经济前景和通胀的担忧持续存在，美国消费者情绪降至三个月来的最低点。【原文：US consumer sentiment declined to a three-month low as tariff-related concerns about the economic outlook and inflation persisted.】

item.title: 通胀指标趋于稳定，国债保持周涨幅
item.description: 在美联储首选的通胀指标符合经济学家的预期之后，受美联储降息预期的推动，美国国债保持了本周的涨势。【原文：US Treasuries maintained their weekly gains fueled by anticipation of Federal Reserve interest rate cuts after the central bank’s preferred gauge of inflation matched economist estimates.】

item.title: 美联储首选通胀指标依然坚挺，美国股市下滑
item.description: 周五，美国股市在劳动节长周末前从历史记录上回落，成交量稀少，投资者在美联储首选的基本通胀指标上月仍居高不下后获利了结。【原文：US stocks retreated from records on thin volume Friday ahead of the long Labor Day holiday weekend, with investors taking profits after the Federal Reserve’s preferred measure of underlying inflation remained stubbornly high last month.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮吸引哈萨克斯坦的石油财富
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦正准备将其部分国家财富投入人工智能基础设施，加入全球风投公司和能源富国的热潮，在这一领域下注数十亿美元，尽管存在波动性和估值飙升的问题。【原文：Kazakhstan is preparing to channel some of its national wealth into artificial intelligence infrastructure, joining a global rush where venture capital firms and energy-rich states are betting billions on the sector despite volatility and surging valuations.】

item.title: 美国取消对英特尔、三星和 SK 海力士的中国豁免权
item.description: 特朗普政府将撤销英特尔公司（Intel Corp. ）旗下三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co. ）和SK海力士公司（SK Hynix Inc.【原文：The Trump Administration will revoke waivers for the use of US technologies by the Chinese operations of an Intel Corp. unit, Samsung Electronics Co. and SK Hynix Inc., dealing another blow to China’s access to advanced chipmaking know-how.】

item.title: 芝加哥学校董事会通过预算，未提供有争议的贷款
item.description: 芝加哥教育委员会周四批准了一项 102.5 亿美元的预算，其中不包括一项有争议的贷款，并规定向市政府支付养老金取决于州和地方的额外资金，从而结束了因至少三年来最严重的资金紧张而加剧的数月紧张局势。【原文：The Chicago Board of Education on Thursday approved a $10.25 billion budget without a controversial loan and makes a pension payment to the city contingent on additional state and local money, capping months of tensions heightened by its worst cash crunch in at least three years.】

item.title: 巴尔的摩的不良抵押贷款撼动了 1400 亿美元的债务机器
item.description: 得到华尔街巨头支持的私人抵押贷款机构正面临着一个令人不安的现实：它们的飞速发展使其变得越来越脆弱。【原文：Private mortgage lenders with the backing of Wall Street’s biggest names are facing an unsettling reality: Their breakneck growth has made them increasingly vulnerable.】

item.title: 肯尼亚 8 月份通货膨胀率连续第三个月上升
item.description: 受玉米和蔬菜等主食价格上涨的影响，肯尼亚 8 月份的通货膨胀率连续第三个月上升。【原文：Kenya’s inflation rate ticked up in August for a third consecutive month, driven by higher prices of staple food items such as corn and vegetables.】

item.title: 尽管通胀顽固，美国消费者支出仍稳步增长
item.description: 美国 7 月份的消费支出增幅为四个月来最大，表明在通胀顽固的情况下需求仍有弹性。【原文：US consumer spending rose in July by the most in four months, indicating resilient demand in the face of stubborn inflation.】

item.title: 贸易战打压出口，加拿大经济萎缩 1.6
item.description: 由于与美国的贸易战抑制了出口和商业投资，加拿大经济出现了近两年来的首次萎缩。【原文：The Canadian economy contracted for the first time in nearly two years as the trade war with the US pinched exports and business investment.】

item.title: 挪威领导人斥责美国参议员格雷厄姆对2万亿美元基金的批评
item.description: 美国参议员林赛-格雷厄姆（Lindsey Graham）就挪威主权财富基金撤资卡特彼勒公司（Caterpillar Inc.【原文：An angry outburst by US Senator Lindsey Graham at Norway’s sovereign wealth fund over its divestment of Caterpillar Inc. prompted a response by the Nordic nation’s prime minister to explain the government has no role in the fund’s decisions, his office said.】

item.title: Verisure 首席执行官正在为安全公司在斯德哥尔摩上市做准备
item.description: 安全服务公司 Verisure 首席执行官奥斯汀-拉利（Austin Lally）表示，该公司正计划在斯德哥尔摩上市，最快可能在本季度进行首次公开募股。【原文：Security services company Verisure is planning to list in Stockholm, and could launch an initial public offering as soon as this quarter, according to Chief Executive Officer Austin Lally.】

item.title: 德国通胀意外加快，超出欧洲央行 2% 的目标
item.description: 德国通胀率超过预期，超过了 2%，为该地区主要经济体一轮喜忧参半的价格数据画上了句号，但这些数据不太可能说服欧洲中央银行在下个月改变利率。【原文：German inflation quickened more than anticipated to surpass 2%, capping a mixed round of price data from the region’s top economies that’s unlikely to persuade the European Central Bank to change interest rates next month.】

item.title: 世界银行出售 5.1 亿美元贷款支持的发展中市场公司债券
item.description: 世界银行出售了 5.1 亿美元的债券，这些债券由它向发展中国家的公司提供的贷款支持，这是它吸引更多机构投资者进入借款人较难筹集到现金的地区的努力之一。【原文：The World Bank sold $510 million of bonds backed by loans it gave companies across the developing world, part of its efforts to lure more institutional investors to regions where borrowers have a harder time raising cash.】
